title: Catering Rewards
description: Successfully delivered end-to-end solutions for catering rewards, aimed at fostering customer loyalty and increasing company profits.Developed and maintained three portals (Admin, Restaurant, and Customer). Leveraged a serverless architecture and  deploy it, implemented a robust reward system and automated order processing.

title: Founder Crate
description: An efficient Fundraising CRM and Investor Relation Management(IRM) suite that revolutionizes investor interactions and optimizes fundraising processes. Simplified investor discovery and management, streamlined investor interactions with a structured system for updates and engagement tracking, enhanced security and compliance and also, centralized investor management.
